TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Capture extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示来自单个成功子表达式捕获的结果。

span.span: Represents the results from a single successful subexpression capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象是不可变，并且没有公共构造函数。A object is immutable and has no public constructor. 通过返回实例对象，即通过`Match.Captures`和属性。Instances are returned through the object, which is returned by the `Match.Captures` and properties. 但是，`Match.Captures`属性提供相同的匹配项有关的信息对象。However, the `Match.Captures` property provides information about the same match as the object. 如果您不会将应用于捕获组，属性返回与单个提供相同的捕获有关的信息的对象对象。If you do not apply a to a capturing group, the property returns a with a single object that provides information about the same capture as the object. 如果您对一个捕获组应用限定符`Group.Index`， `Group.Length`，和`Group.Value`属性提供仅涉及最后的捕获组的信息，而中的对象提供所有相关信息子表达式捕获。If you do apply a quantifier to a capturing group, the `Group.Index`, `Group.Length`, and `Group.Value` properties provide information only about the last captured group, whereas the objects in the provide information about all subexpression captures. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下面的示例定义正则表达式相匹配包含除外一段时间没有标点符号的句子 ("。")。The following example defines a regular expression that matches sentences that contain no punctuation except for a period ("."). [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式 `((\w+)[\s.])+` 的定义如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `((\w+)[\s.])+` is defined as shown in the following table. 请注意，在此正则表达式中，限定符 （+） 应用于整个正则表达式。Note that in this regular expression, a quantifier (+) is applied to the entire regular expression. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w+)`|匹配一个或多个单词字符。Match one or more word characters. 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| |`[\s.])`|匹配空白字符或句点 ("。")。Match a white-space character or period (".").| |`((\w+)[\s.])`|匹配一个或多个单词字符，再后跟空白字符或句号 ("。")。Match one or more word characters followed by a white-space character or period ("."). 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`((\w+)[\s.])+`|匹配一个或多个以下模式： 一个单词字符或字符后跟空白字符或句点 ("。")。Match one or more occurrences of a word character or characters followed by a white-space character or period (".").| 在此示例中，输入的字符串包含两个句子。In this example, the input string consists of two sentences. 如输出所示，第一个句子包括只有一个单词，因此对象具有单个对象，表示相同的捕获对象。As the output shows, the first sentence consists of only one word, so the object has a single object that represents the same capture as the object. 第二个句子包含多个单词，因此对象只包含有关最后一个匹配的子表达式的信息。The second sentence consists of multiple words, so the objects only contain information about the last matched subexpression. 组 1，它表示的第一个捕获，包含具有结算期间该句中最后一个单词。Group 1, which represents the first capture, contains the last word in the sentence that has a closing period. 组 2，它表示第二个捕获，包含该句中最后一个单词。Group 2, which represents the second capture, contains the last word in the sentence. 但是，在组的对象对象捕获每个子表达式匹配项。However, the objects in the group's object capture each subexpression match. 的捕获的第一个捕获组的集合中的对象包含有关每个已捕获的单词和空白字符或句点的信息。The objects in the first capturing group's collection of captures contain information about each captured word and white-space character or period. 的捕获的第二个捕获组的集合中的对象包含有关每个已捕获的单词的信息。The objects in the second capturing group's collection of captures contain information about each captured word.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 原始字符串中发现捕获的子字符串的第一个字符的位置。

span.span: The position in the original string where the first character of the captured substring is found.

value.span: 原始字符串中发现捕获的子字符串的从零开始的起始位置。

span.span: The zero-based starting position in the original string where the captured substring is found.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Length As Integer
public: property int Length { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取捕获的子字符串的长度。

span.span: Gets the length of the captured substring.

value.span: 捕获的子字符串的长度。

span.span: The length of the captured substring.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 通过调用 属性，从输入的字符串中检索捕获的子字符串。

span.span: Retrieves the captured substring from the input string by calling the property.

returns.span: 通过匹配捕获的子字符串。

span.span: The substring that was captured by the match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ToString` 是实际到一个内部调用属性。`ToString` is actually an internal call to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取输入的字符串中的捕获的子字符串。

span.span: Gets the captured substring from the input string.

value.span: 通过匹配捕获的子字符串。

span.span: The substring that is captured by the match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用或方法未能找到匹配项，则返回的值`Match.Value`属性是。If a call to the or method fails to find a match, the value of the returned `Match.Value` property is . 如果正则表达式引擎不能与捕获组匹配。If the regular expression engine is unable to match a capturing group. 返回值`Group.Value`属性是。the value of the returned `Group.Value` property is . 请参阅方面的演示的第二个示例。See the second example for an illustration. ## Examples 下面的示例定义正则表达式相匹配包含除外一段时间没有标点符号的句子 ("。")。The following example defines a regular expression that matches sentences that contain no punctuation except for a period ("."). `Match.Value`属性将显示结果字符串，其中包括匹配句子，每个匹配项。The `Match.Value` property displays the result string, which consists of a matched sentence, for each match. `Group.Value`属性显示每个捕获组的结果字符串; 它包含由该捕获组捕获的最后一个字符串。The `Group.Value` property displays the result string for each capturing group; it consists of the last string captured by that capturing group. 属性显示每个捕获的结果字符串。The property displays the result string for each capture. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式 `((\w+)[\s.])+` 的定义如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `((\w+)[\s.])+` is defined as shown in the following table. 请注意，在此正则表达式中，限定符 （+） 应用于整个正则表达式。Note that in this regular expression, a quantifier (+) is applied to the entire regular expression. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w+)`|匹配一个或多个单词字符。Match one or more word characters. 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| |`[\s.])`|匹配空白字符或句点 ("。")。Match a white-space character or period (".").| |`((\w+)[\s.])`|匹配一个或多个单词字符，再后跟空白字符或句号 ("。")。Match one or more word characters followed by a white-space character or period ("."). 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`((\w+)[\s.])+`|匹配一个或多个以下模式： 一个单词字符或字符后跟空白字符或句点 ("。")。Match one or more occurrences of a word character or characters followed by a white-space character or period (".").| 在此示例中，输入的字符串包含两个句子。In this example, the input string consists of two sentences. 如输出所示，第一个句子包括只有一个单词，因此对象具有单个对象，表示相同的捕获对象。As the output shows, the first sentence consists of only one word, so the object has a single object that represents the same capture as the object. 第二个句子包含多个单词，因此对象只包含有关最后一个匹配的子表达式的信息。The second sentence consists of multiple words, so the objects only contain information about the last matched subexpression. 组 1，它表示的第一个捕获，包含具有结算期间该句中最后一个单词。Group 1, which represents the first capture, contains the last word in the sentence that has a closing period. 组 2，它表示第二个捕获，包含该句中最后一个单词。Group 2, which represents the second capture, contains the last word in the sentence. 但是，在组的对象对象捕获每个子表达式匹配项。However, the objects in the group's object capture each subexpression match. 的捕获的第一个捕获组的集合中的对象包含有关每个已捕获的单词和空白字符或句点的信息。The objects in the first capturing group's collection of captures contain information about each captured word and white-space character or period. 的捕获的第二个捕获组的集合中的对象包含有关每个已捕获的单词的信息。The objects in the second capturing group's collection of captures contain information about each captured word. 下面的示例使用正则表达式模式中， `^([a-z]+)(\d+)*\.([a-z]+(\d)*)$`，用于匹配由句点分隔的两个部分组成的产品编号。The following example uses a regular expression pattern, `^([a-z]+)(\d+)*\.([a-z]+(\d)*)$`, to match a product number that consists of two parts separated by a period. 这两个部分包含字母字符后跟可选的数字。Both parts consist of alphabetic characters followed by optional numbers. 因为第一个输入的字符串与模式，则返回的值不匹配对象的`Value`属性是。Because the first input string does not match the pattern, the value of the returned object's `Value` property is . 同样，当正则表达式模式不能与捕获组，相应的值匹配时对象的`Value`属性是。Similarly, when the regular expression pattern is unable to match a capturing group, the value of the corresponding object's `Value` property is . [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Value#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.value/cs/value1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture.Value#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.capture.value/vb/value1.vb#1)] 下表中所示，正则表达式模式的定义：The regular expression pattern is defined as shown in the following table: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`^`|从字符串开头开始匹配。Begin the match at the beginning of the string.| |`([a-z]+)`|匹配一个或多个匹配项的任意字符在从 a 到 z。Match one or more occurrences of any character from a to z. 因为正则表达式引擎传递选项，此比较不区分大小写。Because the regular expression engine is passed the option, this comparison is case-insensitive. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`(\d+)?`|匹配零个或一个匹配项的一个或多个十进制数字。Match zero or one occurrence of one or more decimal digits. 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| |`\.`|匹配文本句点字符。Match a literal period character.| |`([a-z]+`|匹配一个或多个匹配项的任意字符在从 a 到 z。Match one or more occurrences of any character from a to z. 比较不区分大小写。The comparison is case-insensitive.| |`(\d)*`|匹配零个或多个十进制数字。Match zero or more decimal digits. 单个匹配的数字是四个捕获组。A single matched digit is the fourth capturing group.| |`([a-z]+(\d)*)`|匹配一个或多个字母的字符从 a 到 z 跟零个、 一个或多个十进制数。Match one or more alphabetic characters from a to z followed by zero, one, or more decimal digits. 这是第四个捕获组。This is the fourth capturing group.| |`$`|推断字符串的末尾匹配。Conclude the match at the end of the string.|
